tools.chatgpt: Advanced AI chatbot that can understand complex prompts and generate human-like text responses.
tools.midjourney: AI art generator that creates stunning images from text descriptions with remarkable quality.
tools.githubCopilot: AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and functions as you type.
tools.dalle: OpenAI's image generation system that creates realistic images and art from text descriptions.
tools.jasper: AI content assistant that helps create marketing copy, blog posts, and other written content.
tools.runwayml: Creative suite for AI-generated and AI-enhanced video production and editing.
